title: How to Bake an Election Day Cake

steps.headline: Dredge fruit in 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) flour.
Add all the remaining ingredients to the bread dough.
Butter a bread pan and add the dough.
Add the butter to a saucepan.
Bring the mixture to the boiling point and cook 13 minutes.
Remove saucepan from the flame and then beat until the frosting is of spreading consistency.
Pour frosting over the Election Cake.
Use the back of a spoon or knife to make decorative swirls once the frosting has firmed up.

text: Cake Add butter to bread dough.  Dredge fruit in 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) flour.  Add all the remaining ingredients to the bread dough. Mix well to combine. Butter a bread pan and add the dough.  Let dough rise 1 1/4 hours.  Preheat oven to 325ºF/170ºC.  Bake cake 1 hour.  Frosting Add the butter to a saucepan. Melt butter. Add the sugar and milk. Stir well. Bring the mixture to the boiling point and cook 13 minutes.  Remove saucepan from the flame and then beat until the frosting is of spreading consistency.  Beat in the vanilla.  Pour frosting over the Election Cake.  Use the back of a spoon or knife to make decorative swirls once the frosting has firmed up.  Finished.
